pages.text: $(l:spellcrafters_desk)Making spells$(/l) is nice and all, but sometimes you want to use $(l:mana)mana$(/l) to conjure more physical items into the world. Enter the Artificer's Table. This imbues items with $(l:mana)mana$(/l) to produce artifacts.$(br2)On the outer edges are slots for $(l:mana)mana$(/l). The inner 4 slots are for items, and the result will be placed in the center.
